title: SIAS releases ARGADH – Art Deco Irish
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110001im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Tschild_ARDAGH_1_3831.png)

I take the pleasure to announce [ARDAGH](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110001/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/andreas-stotzner/ardagh/), yet another Arthur variant font. Enjoy typographic irishness in a sophisticated style.  
Ardagh is the second release of a new special Irish font design at SIAS.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110001im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Tschild_ARDAGH_4-whiskey_4365.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110001im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Tschild_ARDAGH_2_6237.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110001im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Tschild_ARDAGH_3_3740.png)
author: Andreas Stötzner
